Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 67th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2010...
Traded from Baltimore to Minnesota on 2/4/2014 (Going to MIN: P M. Harvey, 3B D. Kinder. Going to BAL: P A. Wood, 2B G. Alvarado)...
Earned first career win on 4/19/2015...
Had first career hit on 6/7/2015, off Chad Bettis (ARI)...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Arizona on 6/7/2015, striking out 7...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (A) on 6/18/2017...
Traded from Minnesota to Washington on 7/7/2018 (Going to MIN: CF E. Averill Jr., P H. Meine Jr.. Going to WSH: P M. Harvey)...
Traded from Washington to Detroit on 1/31/2019 (Going to DET: SS R. Hornsby Jr., P M. Harvey, CF C. Rasmus. Going to WSH: 1B J. Foxx Jr., P R. Langhorne, RF J. Bradley)...
